content.rendered:
Nicole Sequeira, President
Jessica Dawson, Vice President 
Website: https://hsadn.wordpress.com/
Contact: dorothynolanhsa1@gmail.com

Dorothy Nolan has a very supportive Home School Association. Our HSA sponsors many events for children and their families throughout the school year. These events give families and students opportunities to build relationships with each other and with our school’s faculty and staff.

Throughout the school year the HSA holds both FUNDraising and FUNraising events to help build school spirit and raise the funds needed to support all of the enrichment programs that the children participate in during the year. These programs include field trips and programs/assemblies that come to the school, such as “Grama Tippy Toes”, Theater Works, authors, dance companies, and so much more.

In addition to enrichment programs, the HSA also supports a wide variety of programs such as our Drama Club, Art Show, Book Fair, Yearbook, 5th Grade Field End of Year Trip, End of Year Gavin Park parties, and Alumni Awards just to name a few.

Finally, we host fun Dorothy Community events throughout the year like the Trunk or Treat, Shamrock Dance, and Spring Fling. 

Please reach out to get involved. All are welcome!
